message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still looking to keep my spending within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?
